trans-unit.source: Eclipse zenoh is an extremely efficient and fault-tolerant Named Data Networking (NDN) protocol that is able to scale down to extremely constrainded devices and networks.
trans-unit.target: Eclipse zenoh是一种极其高效且具有容错能力的命名数据网络（NDN）协议，该协议能够按比例缩小到极为受限的设备和网络。

trans-unit.source: All MacOS X >= 10.9
trans-unit.target: 所有MacOS X> = 10.9

trans-unit.source: Also make sure to have cmake >= 3.0 available on your host.
trans-unit.target: 另外，请确保主机上的cmake> = 3.0。

trans-unit.source: Eclipse zenoh Python API
trans-unit.target: Eclipse zenoh Python API

trans-unit.source: For convenience, a top-level Makefile is available. Just do the following to build and install:
trans-unit.target: 为了方便起见,我们提供了一个顶层的Makefile。只需按以下步骤进行构建和安装。

trans-unit.source: How to build it
trans-unit.target: 如何建立它

trans-unit.source: How to install it
trans-unit.target: 如何安装

trans-unit.source: Install the latest available version using pip:
trans-unit.target: 使用 pip 安装最新的可用版本：

trans-unit.source: It relies on the zenoh-c API which is currently supported on the following platforms:
trans-unit.target: 它依赖于以下平台当前支持的zenoh-c API：

trans-unit.source: Linux
trans-unit.target: Linux

trans-unit.source: MacOS X
trans-unit.target: MacOS X

trans-unit.source: Most of the 32-bits Linux distriutions thanks to manylinux2010_i686
trans-unit.target: 由于manylinux2010_i686,大多数32位的Linux distriutions。

trans-unit.source: Most of the 64-bits Linux distriutions thanks to manylinux2010_x86_64
trans-unit.target: 由于manylinux2010_x86_64,大部分64位的Linux系统都有了很大的进步。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the Python wheels available on Pypi.org are pre-compiled for:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Pypi.org上可用的Python轮子已预先编译为：

trans-unit.source: On other Linux architectures such as Raspberry, the pip tool will be able to download the sources distribution and to compile it.
trans-unit.target: 在其他Linux体系结构（如Raspberry）上， pip 工具将能够下载源代码分发并进行编译。

trans-unit.source: Python client API for Eclipse zenoh
trans-unit.target: 用于Eclipse zenoh的Python客户端API

trans-unit.source: Running the Examples
trans-unit.target: 运行示例

trans-unit.source: Supported Python versions and platforms
trans-unit.target: 支持的Python版本和平台

trans-unit.source: The Eclipse zenoh-python library is available on Pypi.org.
trans-unit.target: Eclipse zenoh-python库在Pypi.org上可用。

trans-unit.source: The Python API is for pure clients, in other terms does not support peer-to-peer communication, can be easily tested against a zenoh router running in a Docker container (see https://github.com/eclipse-zenoh/zenoh#how-to-test-it).
trans-unit.target: Python API适用于纯客户端，换句话说，它不支持对等通信，可以针对在Docker容器中运行的zenoh路由器轻松进行测试（请参阅https://github.com/eclipse-zenoh/zenoh#如何测试）。

trans-unit.source: The simplest way to run some of the example is to get a Docker image of the zenoh network router (see https://github.com/eclipse-zenoh/zenoh#how-to-test-it) and then to run the examples on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 运行某些示例的最简单方法是获取zenoh网络路由器的Docker映像（请参阅https://github.com/eclipse-zenoh/zenoh#how-to-test-it），然后运行示例在您的机器上。

trans-unit.source: The zenoh-python repository uses the zenoh-c repository as a sub-module. Thus, be sure to also clone this submodule.
trans-unit.target: zenoh-python存储库使用zenoh-c存储库作为子模块。因此，请确保也克隆此子模块。

trans-unit.source: Then, run the zenoh-python examples following the instructions in examples/zenoh/README.md
trans-unit.target: 然后，按照examples / zenoh / README.md中的说明运行zenoh-python示例

trans-unit.source: zenoh-python has been tested with Python 3.5, 3.6, 3.7 and 3.8.
trans-unit.target: zenoh-python已经在Python 3.5、3.6、3.7和3.8中测试过。
